(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the)
              (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ heartwarming))
              (NNS blogs))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP I))
                (VP (VBP have)
                  (VP (VBN written)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, This-1)
cop(one-4, is-2)
advmod(one-4, probably-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
det(blogs-9, the-6)
advmod(heartwarming-8, most-7)
amod(blogs-9, heartwarming-8)
pobj(of-5, blogs-9)
nsubj(written-12, I-10)
aux(written-12, have-11)
rcmod(blogs-9, written-12)

            (NP (DT the) (NN tummy))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Jamie) (POS 's))
        (NNP World) (NNP Class) (NNP Restaurant))

        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN reservation) (NN list))

            (WHNP (WDT which))

                (ADJP
                  (NP (CD 3) (NNS months))
                  (JJ long))))))))

    (S
      (NP (PRP he))
      (VP (VBZ employs)

          (NP (JJ disadvantaged) (NNS youths))
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB train)
              (NP (PRP them))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (NNS chefs))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ turns)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ own) (`` ``) (JJ Jamie) (NN Oliver) ('' ''))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP Singapore)))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ takes)
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNS ex-convicts))
                        (PP (IN during)
                          (NP
                            (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS months))

                              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN jail) (NN sentence)))))))

                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB train)
                          (NP (PRP them))
                          (PP (IN in)
                            (NP (JJ necessary) (NNS skills))))))))))

              (S
                (NP (PRP they))
                (VP (MD can)
                  (VP (VB have)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ new) (NN start))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (NN life))))))))))))
    (. .)))

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB make)
              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ very) (JJ own) (NNP Singapore) (NN style) (NN baked) (NN rice)))))))
    (. .)))

            (NP (NN marijuana))))))
    (. .)))

            (PP (IN on)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN wall))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD was)
                      (VP (VBN painted)
                        (PP (IN by)
                          (NP (DT the) (NNS ex-offenders)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, have-1)
det(look-3, a-2)
dobj(have-1, look-3)
prep(look-3, at-4)
det(mural-6, the-5)
pobj(at-4, mural-6)
prep(mural-6, on-7)
det(wall-9, the-8)
pobj(on-7, wall-9)
nsubjpass(painted-12, which-10)
auxpass(painted-12, was-11)
rcmod(wall-9, painted-12)
prep(painted-12, by-13)
det(ex-offenders-15, the-14)
pobj(by-13, ex-offenders-15)

            (PP (IN of)

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Make)
      (ADJP (JJ sure))
      (SBAR (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP want)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB try)
                  (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ baked) (NN Crab))
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (VBP ring)
                        (ADVP
                          (ADVP (RB up) (IN before) (NN hand))
                          (SBAR (IN as)
                            (S
                              (NP (PRP it))
                              (VP (VBZ is)
                                (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN order) (NN item))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (NP
    (S
      (S
        (NP (PRP You))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB ring)
                (PRT (RP up))
                (NP
                  (NP (CD 2) (NNS days))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NN advance)))))))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (ADVP (RB only))
          (ADJP (JJ available)
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (NNP Wed) (NNS nights))))
          (S
            (VP (VBG starting)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP August) (NNP Recommended)))
              (PP (IN by)
                (NP (NNS liveyrdreams))))))))))


nsubj(have-2, You-1)
root(ROOT-0, have-2)
aux(ring-4, to-3)
xcomp(have-2, ring-4)
prt(ring-4, up-5)
num(days-7, 2-6)
dobj(ring-4, days-7)
prep(days-7, in-8)
pobj(in-8, advance-9)
cc(have-2, and-10)
nsubj(available-14, it-11)
cop(available-14, is-12)
advmod(available-14, only-13)
conj(have-2, available-14)
prep(available-14, on-15)
nn(nights-17, Wed-16)
pobj(on-15, nights-17)
xcomp(available-14, starting-18)
prep(starting-18, in-19)
nn(Recommended-21, August-20)
pobj(in-19, Recommended-21)
prep(starting-18, by-22)
pobj(by-22, liveyrdreams-23)
